export const fontFamilyMain = `gill-sans-nova, sans-serif`

export const colorGrey = `#333333`;

export const fontSizeXXL = `3.6rem`
export const fontSizeXL = `2.4rem`
export const fontSizeL = `1.6rem`
export const fontSizeM = `1.2rem`
export const fontSizeS = `.8rem`
export const fontSizeXS = `.6rem`

export const fontWeightXS = 200
export const fontWeightS = 300
export const fontWeightM = 400
export const fontWeightL = 600
export const fontWeightXL = 700

export const paddingXL = '1.2rem 2.4rem'
export const paddingL = '1rem 2rem'
export const paddingM = '0.8rem 1.6rem'
export const paddingS = '0.6rem 1.2rem'
export const paddingXS = '0.4rem .8rem'

export const testBorder = `border: 1px solid black`
